statements: SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, quantity, status FROM ShippingOrders WHERE status = 'shipped';
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM ShippingOrders WHERE customer_id = 100 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM ShippingOrders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders WHERE product_id IN (5, 7, 9) AND status = 'processing';
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id FROM ShippingOrders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ShippingOrders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM ShippingOrders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, status FROM ShippingOrders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM OrderItems WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders WHERE status='Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM ShippingOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM OrderItems WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM ShippingOrders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity*price) AS total_cost FROM OrderItems GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM shipping_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, status FROM shipping_orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT location, timestamp FROM order_tracking WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM shipping_orders ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM shipping_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM order_tracking WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT order_id, status, location, timestamp FROM shipping_orders JOIN order_tracking ON shipping_orders.order_id = order_tracking.order_id;
SELECT * FROM ShippingOrders;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone='123-456-7890';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT warehouse_location, warehouse_manager FROM Warehouse WHERE warehouse_capacity > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_status='Shipped';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_status, order_date FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_status='Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE warehouse_capacity > 500 ORDER BY warehouse_capacity DESC;

SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name, product_name FROM ShippingOrders JOIN Customers ON ShippingOrders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Products ON ShippingOrders.order_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, status FROM orders WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, status FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_name = customers.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_id ASC;
SELECT order_date, customer_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_name = customers.customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1001;
